geocode_en.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Cheung Chau, 4 G/F San Hing Street

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 香港 Cheung Chau, 4 G/F San Hing Street

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Cheung Chau, 4 G/F San Hing Street
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Cheung Chau, 4 G/F San Hing Street
result.name: Valor Cheung Chau

reviews.text:
Valor Cheung Chau made the last stop of our Cheung Chau food hunting tour. I visited wishing to try out their famous coconut ice dripped coffee served in a real coconut, but it was sold out at around 5pm, so I got a pineapple one instead.

This Pineapple Ice Dripped Coffee is really interesting. It’s like an iced coffee with a strong pineapple flavour. Yet, it is not overly sweet as I expected, and the coffee aroma is not masked by the sweet fruit. 

Valor Cheung Chau has a really cool vibes for you to chill in. It’s almost like a bar but only coffee is served instead of draft beer. I finished my iced coffee quickly as we were really conscious about the ferry schedule so that we didn’t have to wait for another hour for a ferry to go back to Central. The coffee was quite icy at the bottom indeed, with a lot of shaved ice…I guess this would be perfect for summer.

The ambiance is pleasant, and surprisingly modern given the surrounding shops. Good lighting and decor, but I didn't feel a lick of AC while I was there.

I found the single origin cold brew coffee to be lacking. It was far too bitter from what I assume is over-extraction of the grounds. My cup had no chance of delivering the flavors described on the menu. Might have more luck with the hot brew coffees made in front of you. 

Someone cared about the products put out by this shop in the past, but I think it is well past it's prime now.
a comfortable place to sit down during summer. Drinks are nice.
Chilled cafe. Iced Honey Lemon Coffee tastes good and refreshing especially in hot weather
Nice coffee at a comfortable place in Cheung Chau.

result.vicinity: 4 G/F San Hing Street, Cheung Chau

result.formatted_address: 香港 Cheung Chau, 4 G/F San Hing Street
result.name: 啡寮

reviews.text:
Valor Cheung Chau made the last stop of our Cheung Chau food hunting tour. I visited wishing to try out their famous coconut ice dripped coffee served in a real coconut, but it was sold out at around 5pm, so I got a pineapple one instead.

This Pineapple Ice Dripped Coffee is really interesting. It’s like an iced coffee with a strong pineapple flavour. Yet, it is not overly sweet as I expected, and the coffee aroma is not masked by the sweet fruit. 

Valor Cheung Chau has a really cool vibes for you to chill in. It’s almost like a bar but only coffee is served instead of draft beer. I finished my iced coffee quickly as we were really conscious about the ferry schedule so that we didn’t have to wait for another hour for a ferry to go back to Central. The coffee was quite icy at the bottom indeed, with a lot of shaved ice…I guess this would be perfect for summer.
很用心介紹各種咖啡，很可惜這次造訪，蜂蜜和部份想品嘗的咖啡缺貨～離島補貨慢一點@

The ambiance is pleasant, and surprisingly modern given the surrounding shops. Good lighting and decor, but I didn't feel a lick of AC while I was there.

I found the single origin cold brew coffee to be lacking. It was far too bitter from what I assume is over-extraction of the grounds. My cup had no chance of delivering the flavors described on the menu. Might have more luck with the hot brew coffees made in front of you. 

Someone cared about the products put out by this shop in the past, but I think it is well past it's prime now.
放假入長洲走走,鐘意飲咖啡☕,午餐後四圍走,經過啡寮,出奇今日冇人,感覺包埸非常好,久聞這裡有🥥椰皇☕咖啡,必定試,可惜冇小食配上,這個椰皇啡味道特別,入口有椰子味,建議不好即時吞咖啡,要慢慢品味🤓,不可以急飲,同一般咖啡不同,一啖入口即吞,就等於食之無味,棄之可惜.😄
The place is tidy and clean. Coffee is special. 地方很乾淨，咖啡有特色。

result.vicinity: 4 G/F San Hing Street, Cheung Chau
